name: roller-skates
effect: Allows the player to move quickly and off the grid.
short_effect: Allows the player to move quickly and off the grid.

flavor_text.sun_moon: Attaches roller skates to the bottom of your shoes, allowing you to glide quickly around and perform tricks.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Attaches roller skates to the bottom of your shoes, allowing you to glide quickly around and perform tricks.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Attaches roller skates to the bottom of your shoes, allowing you to glide quickly around and perform tricks.
